column3: Latest;Phnom Penh:------ On the morning of August 2
column5: ------sewage workers------ published photos on what it looks like underneath the streets of the capital.------They call on all people to dispose of garbage in a proper place so that it can easily be collected
column6: otherwise the environment and living conditions of residents will suffer.------Plastic refuse blocks the drainage
column7: leading to bad smells and flooding during the rainy season.------https://postnews.com.kh/local/469434
